persona.name: Jordan
persona.bio: Jordan is a 24-year-old college athlete who plays basketball and follows the latest sneaker drops. He cares about both performance and style, and he often browses Nike’s website to check out new releases. Jordan doesn’t like wasting time digging through menus—he wants to get straight to the newest basketball shoes. He’s budget-conscious as a student but will splurge on limited editions if they stand out.
